data.persona: I am hungry and looking for some tasty and smelly.  I have many friends that join me in my quest for something to eat.  My large wingspan scares onlookers.
data.description:
You are in the Old Crypt.
Broken stones and a iron gate closing the entrance with a name placard that the name is worn off.
There's two stones, an iron gate, a gate, a flowers, a name placard, and a placard here.
The priest is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to sit on the iron gate.
data.mid_motivation: I want to wait to see if the priest will fall over so that I can eat him, but I am also curious about what he is doing.
data.long_motivation: I want to find a lot of tasty things to eat so that I can grow to have an even bigger wingspan and scare onlookers away; sometimes people try to steal my big feathers and I hate it.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: put two stones in top of old crypt
